thread.title: Vin Diesel wields flaming sword at film premiere
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel wields flaming sword at film premiere - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Vin Diesel wields flaming sword at film premiere
text:
London:  Actor Vin Diesel pleased fans at the premiere of the 'The Last Witch Hunter' by wielding a flaming sword at the red carpet here on Monday.


Vin Diesel holds a flaming sword as he arrives on the red carpet to attend the European premiere of 'The Last Witch Hunter' in London. PIc/AFP 
When he was posing for photographs at the event, Diesel was approached by a man waving flaming swords to celebrate the release of the film. He eventually took one of the flaming swords from the man and wielded it himself, reports aceshowbiz.com.
The "Fast and Furious" actor was also seen taking selfies and signing autographs with fans at the premiere.
He was joined by veteran actor Michael Caine on the red carpet and the two posed together side-by-side.
The 82-year-old actor wore a navy suit over a light blue shirt, looking radiant and healthy.
Meanwhile, actress Rose Leslie opted for a simple-but-glamorous look.
She wore a magenta sequinned dress which she teamed with a black clutch. The 28-year-old actress sported wavy natural hair. Leslie was also spotted hugging Diesel before the two posed together on the red carpet.
In "The Last Witch Hunter", Diesel stars as Kaulder, an 800-year-old witch hunter who was cursed to be immortal after he defeated Queen Witch.
Also in the cast are Elijah Wood, Olafur Darri Olafsson, Rena Owen, Julie Engelbrecht, Joseph Gilgun and Isaach de Bankole.
The fantasy movie is slated for a US release on Friday.
